Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 29 May 2025
Last Updated: 29 May 2025

At Sanctaris Games, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your data when you play Alliance Forge or interact with our services.

Data We Collect:

  • Account info (email, username, wallet address)
  • Gameplay data (progress, session activity)
  • Device & technical data (IP, OS, browser)
  • Purchase data (transaction IDs, NFT ownership)
  • Support communications

We do not store payment card information.

Use of Data: To run/improve the game, authenticate accounts, manage blockchain assets/NFTs, send updates, and comply with legal obligations.

Third-Party Sharing: With blockchain platforms (e.g., Cronos, OpenSea), hosting/analytics providers, and payment gateways (USDC, WalletConnect). We never sell your data.

Your Rights (GDPR & CCPA): Access, correct, delete, or port your data; object to/restrict processing; withdraw consent; file complaints. Contact us at allianceforge22@gmail.com.

Cookies: We use essential and analytics cookies. Manage preferences in your browser.

Children’s Privacy: Not intended for users under 16 (or 13 in the U.S.).

Security: We use encryption, secure servers, and access controls.

Policy Updates: Revisions posted here.
